pageContext.claim: “If you look at New York, where it’s going up like nobody has ever seen anything. The numbers are going up 100 percent, 150 percent, 200 percent, crime.”
pageContext.analysis: These numbers do not add up. In New York, crime overall is down slightly (about 1.5 percent) so far this year. Shootings are up about 93 percent, and murders have increased 38 percent. Crime is down 10 percent compared with 10 years ago in the city.
